items.sentence: Tom asked Mary to pick him up at the station.

I've had this rash on my leg for a long time.
The stake that sticks out gets hammered down.
Their habitat is threatened by deforestation.
I have no idea why Tom quit his job suddenly.
I don't like people who are nice to everyone.
My mother always told me not to eat too fast.
As far as I know, Tom has a driver's license.
I haven't practiced the piano in a long time.
I think Tom and Mary are both still homesick.
I thought that both Tom and Mary were single.
I thought both Tom and Mary were over thirty.
I haven't had a chance to see that movie yet.
Tom might change his mind in the near future.
This sentence can be interpreted in two ways.
It's hard for me to know who you are anymore.
Tom likes to be outdoors as much as possible.

I have to get back home and study for a test.
